alert.note: Alert for Miami-Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 08 at 12:47PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of South Florida, including the following county, Miami-Dade. * WHEN...Until 245 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1247 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 1.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Coral Gables, Kendall, Pinecrest, Palmetto Bay, West Perrine, Richmond Heights, The Falls, Howard and Palmetto Estates. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
